trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <see langword="EmulateRecognizeCompleted" /> event of the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer" /> and <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine" /> classes.
trans-unit.target: Proporciona datos para el evento <see langword="EmulateRecognizeCompleted" /> de las clases <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer" /> y <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine" />.

trans-unit.source: An instance of <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.EmulateRecognizeCompletedEventArgs> is created when the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> object raises the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognizeCompleted> event.
trans-unit.target: Una instancia de <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.EmulateRecognizeCompletedEventArgs> se crea cuando el <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> objeto genera el <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognizeCompleted> eventos.

trans-unit.source: To obtain information about the result of recognition, access the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.EmulateRecognizeCompletedEventArgs.Result%2A> property in the handler for the event.
trans-unit.target: Para obtener información acerca de los resultados de reconocimiento, tener acceso a la <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.EmulateRecognizeCompletedEventArgs.Result%2A> propiedad en el controlador para el evento.

trans-unit.source: Emulation is the process by which text, instead of audio, is the input to a speech recognition engine.
trans-unit.target: Emulación es el proceso por el que el texto, en lugar de audio, es la entrada a un motor de reconocimiento de voz.

trans-unit.source: To bypass the audio inputs for a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> object during emulation, use the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToNull%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Para omitir las entradas de audio para un <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> objeto durante la emulación, use la <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToNull%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: If the speech recognition engine encounters an exception during the recognition operation, the <xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs.Error%2A> property is set to the exception and the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.EmulateRecognizeCompletedEventArgs.Result%2A> property is set to `null`.
trans-unit.target: Si el motor de reconocimiento de voz encuentra una excepción durante la operación de reconocimiento, el <xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs.Error%2A> propiedad se establece en la excepción y la <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.EmulateRecognizeCompletedEventArgs.Result%2A> propiedad está establecida en `null`.

trans-unit.source: The following example adds an event handler for the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognizeCompleted> event to a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>.
trans-unit.target: En el ejemplo siguiente se agrega un controlador de eventos para el <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognizeCompleted> eventos a un <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>.

trans-unit.source: The handler gets the recognized text from the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.EmulateRecognizeCompletedEventArgs.Result%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: El controlador obtiene el texto reconocido desde el <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.EmulateRecognizeCompletedEventArgs.Result%2A> propiedad.

trans-unit.source: Gets the results of emulated recognition.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene los resultados de reconocimiento emulado.

trans-unit.source: Detailed information about the results of recognition, or <see langword="null" /> if an error occurred.
trans-unit.target: Información detallada sobre los resultados de reconocimiento, o <see langword="null" /> si se ha producido un error.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult> object derives from <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedPhrase> and contains full information about a phrase returned by a recognition operation.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult> objeto deriva de <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedPhrase> y contiene toda la información sobre una frase devuelta por una operación de reconocimiento.

trans-unit.source: You can obtain a list off all the recognition candidates from the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult.Alternates%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Puede obtener una lista de todos los candidatos de reconocimiento de la <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult.Alternates%2A> propiedad.

trans-unit.source: If recognizer encounters an exception during the recognition operation, the <xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs.Error%2A> property is set to the exception and the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.EmulateRecognizeCompletedEventArgs.Result%2A> property is set to `null`.
trans-unit.target: Si el reconocedor encuentra una excepción durante la operación de reconocimiento, el <xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs.Error%2A> propiedad se establece en la excepción y la <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.EmulateRecognizeCompletedEventArgs.Result%2A> propiedad está establecida en `null`.
